lines.text: Well, if we assume he knew there was going to be a fire...
Maybe the idea was to make himself fireproof, by coating himself in concrete.
Since concrete doesn't burn, he'd be safe even if the fire got out of control!
Huh. I can see that, maybe, but it doesn't sound like a solid plan.
That concrete shell would turn into an oven real quick- maybe he wouldn't burn, but he'd bake.
And with those breathin' holes in the beard, he'd have to worry about smoke inhalation.
If the idea was safety, it was a heck of a boneheaded move.
Uh... maybe he was a boneheaded guy?
Maybe, but let's make sure he didn't have a better reason first.
